alert.note: Alert for Lake; Newaygo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:56AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Newaygo and southern Lake Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 555 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Scottville, or 13 miles west of Baldwin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baldwin... Chase... Hawkins... Nirvana... Wolf Lake... Big Star Lake... Idlewild... Baldwin Municipal Ai... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
